title: Epic Fantasy Cliff Scene
prompt: At sunset, a lone mage stands on the edge of a rocky cliff overlooking a stormy ocean. Thunder rolls in the distance, wind howls, and waves crash against the rock below. He raises a glowing staff, causing swirling magical particles to rise around him with a soft shimmering sound. The camera performs a slow circular tracking shot, revealing dramatic clouds lit by lightning. Highly cinematic grading, epic fantasy atmosphere, detailed sound design.
description: Эпическая фэнтезийная атмосфера, детальный звуковой дизайн.
